Articles.Content: Simple question. Is multiplayer of some sort planned?
No eelikay, multiplayer is not planned, and may be impossible, time warp and multiplayer do not work together.

I'm getting in a bunker.

To answer your question, not for a long time.

No eelikay, multiplayer is not planned, and may be impossible, time warp and multiplayer do not work together.

unless the amount of players would be small and there would be designated warp times

for example, every 15-20mins there would be a warp

or the server admin/mod would just have access to the warp speed
Im thinking of a mutiplayer buttion and a single player one
Or just use co-operative warping. Silent Hunter 3 had a system where time warping would only engage when all players set the same warp level.

I doubt there would be server/admin, the only game I know of to do time control in a multiplayer game is Defcon.

This means, at best, that a handful of people could play together but warp would only work when all players had warp enabled, if one person stopped warping, all other players would have to as well.

You'd have to wait your "go" and hope you didn't mistime your warp, it'd be a pain in the backside.

Edit: Multiplayer has been discussed to death and then some, please search for topics before posting next time, thread closed
